full_sentence: I dont ever want to know what jail is like but Im sure it's no picnic either. I think it's safe to say that the vast majority of undocumented workers are just regular folks trying to make a living and possibly raise a family just like most of their citizen neighbors. And they are just trying to prove they have the ability to be upstanding citizens too.

full_sentence: Immigrants are not welcome around here
